unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Lights Early in Kerala!**
normalised: energy and utilities solar rooftop subsidies sparking Diwali lights early in Kerala

unnormalised: Thiruvananthapuram: Kerala's power grid is about to get a serious boost, folks! The Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB) is rolling out beefed-up subsidies for rooftop solar installations, just in time for Diwali!
normalised: Thiruvananthapuram Kerala's power grid is about to get a serious boost folks The Kerala State Electricity Board K S E B is rolling out beefed up subsidies for rooftop solar installations just in time for Diwali

unnormalised: Forget those pesky power cuts during your festive biryani feast â€“ imagine powering your entire home (and impressing your neighbours!) with sunshine.
normalised: Forget those pesky power cuts during your festive biryani feast imagine powering your entire home and impressing your neighbours with sunshine

unnormalised: Under the new scheme, homeowners can get up to Rs. 40,000 off for a 3kW system. And if you're feeling particularly generous and want to share your excess power, KSEB offers net metering, meaning you get credited for the energy you pump back into the grid.
normalised: Under the new scheme homeowners can get up to rupee forty thousand off for a three kilowatt system And if you're feeling particularly generous and want to share your excess power K S E B offers net metering meaning you get credited for the energy you pump back into the grid

unnormalised: "We aim to add another 100 MW of solar capacity through rooftop installations this financial year," said a KSEB spokesperson. "Think of it as lighting up not just your home, but also Kerala, sustainably!"
normalised: We aim to add another one hundred megawatt of solar capacity through rooftop installations this financial year said a K S E B spokesperson Think of it as lighting up not just your home but also Kerala sustainably

unnormalised: The application process is supposedly easier than making appam, so what are you waiting for? Go green and save some green, this Diwali! Contact your nearest KSEB office for details. Subsidies are available on a first-come, first-served basis, so hurry!
normalised: The application process is supposedly easier than making appam so what are you waiting for Go green and save some green this Diwali Contact your nearest K S E B office for details Subsidies are available on a first come first served basis so hurry
